channel.title: [WIP] omg 'nother livin room
channel.description:
Im not making any promises, so im just going to work on it as im given CC. Heres the corner of the room so far:
[img]http://fc78.deviantart.com/fs41/f/2009/019/2/6/Ball_Chair_Room_by_Frell262.jpg[/img]
Very simple atm. I think the green in the chair was a bit to much, but like i said FKN CC. Or i'll have to hurt you.

But yeah, its been said the chair could have the colour changed and the top right corner looks a bit off, hard to notice kinda.

item.title: [WIP] omg 'nother livin room
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:8, topic:257434”]Looking better. I’d make the transition between the chair and stand a lot smoother.

And the opening a bit farther back so you get a bigger hole yaknow? But overall scale is much nicer now.[/quote]
Yea, ill re-do the ball chair. It was my first ever attempt and now that i have a way of making it, it should be much easier.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] omg 'nother livin room
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

The room would be scaled a lot better without that border about 9/10s the way up.

The chair doesn’t need to be bigger per se, but it needs to have a much bigger radius and not have such a small opening.

And the socket is too high.

Read full topic

that’s great i like the color scheme but the green does kinda stick out, but oh well it looks great, i like the picture u have hanging in the wall, but maybe change the color of the chair too a less greeny color, doesn’t blend that well with the red and white. but besides that its all good, like how u have the lightening done, and shadow… I want that chair still… whats the big white spot in the top left?
